statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.AddressID , AA.AddressType , M1.Name as AddressTypeName , AA.Description
, BB.PostalCode , BB.Country , BB.City , BB.StateProvince , BB.AddressLine1 , BB.AddressLine2
FROM dbo.BMCustomerAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMAddress BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBAS.DBO.ACCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'AddressType' WHERE AA.CustomerID = #CustomerID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.CustomerID , AA.AddressID , AA.AddressType , AA.Description
, BB.PostalCode , BB.Country , BB.City , BB.StateProvince , BB.AddressLine1 , BB.AddressLine2
FROM dbo.BMCustomerAddress AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.BMAddress BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.AddressID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.BMCustomerAddress ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, CustomerID, AddressID, AddressType, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #CustomerID#, #AddressID#, #AddressType#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.BMCustomerAddress SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName = #UpdateByName#
, CustomerID = #CustomerID# , AddressID = #AddressID# , AddressType = #AddressType# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
statements.delete: DELETE FROM dbo.BMAddress WHERE ID = ( SELECT AddressID FROM dbo.BMCustomerAddress WHERE ID = #ID# ); DELETE FROM dbo.BMCustomerAddress WHERE ID = #ID#;
